content: Sports association in Singapore The **Singapore Lacrosse Association (SLA)** is the organization that focuses on the growth of lacrosse development in Singapore. Formed in October 2012, the SLA became the 47th member of the [Federation of International Lacrosse](/wiki/Federation_of_International_Lacrosse) on 30 July 2013. - Official website This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore Lacrosse Association
